attributes.action: Allow constituencies to vote on whether cannabis should be legalised there.
attributes.additional_details: It has worked exceptionally well in the US, so why not learn from their successes and follow suit? Let the people decide what's right for them.
attributes.background: The government has decided that a nationwide legalisation of cannabis is not on the cards, so perhaps a constituency by constituency ruling could be an alternative. A more democratic way that would allow the trialling of a regulated market in small areas first.

rejection.details: You could start a petition calling on Parliament to change the law, to make local councils responsible for the law on cannabis in their area.
